channel.title: CVE Feed for g5theme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for g5theme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2132|2024-07-05T17:22:26.836Z -- g5theme -- ultimate%20bootstrap%20elements%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Ultimate Bootstrap Elements for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Image Widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1398|2024-03-02T12:39:58.887Z -- g5theme -- ultimate%20bootstrap%20elements%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Ultimate Bootstrap Elements for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘heading_title_tag’ and ’heading_sub_title_tag’ parameters in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4273|2024-06-04T17:54:37.792Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'ere_property_map' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4274|2024-06-04T17:53:25.043Z -- g5theme -- essential%20real%20estate
item.description: The Essential Real Estate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to insufficient validation on the remove_property_attachment_ajax() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.4.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-24797|2024-02-12T07:19:54.053Z -- g5theme -- ere%20recently%20viewed%20%E2%80%93%20essential%20real%20estate%20add-on
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in G5Theme ERE Recently Viewed – Essential Real Estate Add-On.This issue affects ERE Recently Viewed – Essential Real Estate Add-On: from n/a through 1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-2132|2024-04-06T08:38:53.141Z -- g5theme -- ultimate%20bootstrap%20elements%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Ultimate Bootstrap Elements for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Image Widget in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1398|2024-06-24T15:10:36.499Z -- g5theme -- ultimate%20bootstrap%20elements%20for%20elementor
item.description: The Ultimate Bootstrap Elements for Elementor plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘heading_title_tag’ and ’heading_sub_title_tag’ parameters in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.6 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
